description: Students pursue guided fieldwork experience in Taiwan and Japan (Okinawa). Activities and readings in this course build on the topics from the first year ASCON sequence and language study. Students continue to explore their understanding of Asia through language activities, site visits, and ethnographic observations. Students develop projects and follow a process of inquiry that will help them understand how ordinary people construct "Asian" culture and society today. Offered periodically during January term. Prerequisite: JAPAN 112 or CHIN 112.
name: Asian Conversations III (abroad)
title: Asian Conversations III
